text:
Champions League
Champions League: the point on qualified teams
Discover all the teams already qualified for the 1/8 finals of this 2019-2020 edition of the Champions League.
06 Nov 2019, 22:17 by Antoine Chirat



Keylor Navas 6 / 10Match serious enough on the part of the Costa Rican goalkeeper, who did not have much to put in their teeth.Icon Sport



Colin Dagba -Icon Sport



Thiago Silva: 6 / 10The Brazilian has delivered a rather serious copy with several defensive returns which he has the secret. He concedes the penalty on Diagne.Icon Sport



Presnel Kimpembe: 5.5 / 10 A notch below his teammate in central defense, "Maestro Kimpebe" did the job without being transcendent.Icon Sport



Juan Bernat: 6,5 / 10About interesting climbs, the former player of Bayern Munich was able to be strong defensively against the incessant overflows of the opposing wingers.Icon Sport



Idrissa Gueye: 5.5 / 10An activity still brimming with Senegalese but a slight waste in transmissions.Icon Sport



Marquinhos: 6 / 10The new sentinel of Paris Saint-Germain has made a serious match, cutting a lot of offensive offensives.Icon Sport



Marco Verratti: 6.5 / 10 "Little Owl" has once again made his science speak of the pass, also projecting when needed. Indispensable.Icon Sport



Angel Di Maria: 6.5 / 10Intentional decisive driver for Icardi, "Fideo" was the most dangerous element on the Parisian side.Icon Sport



Mauro Icardi: 6 / 10But aside from his goal, the player loaned by Inter Milan did not have a great influence in the Paris game.Icon Sport



Kylian Mbapp√©: 5.5 / 10Overflow, dribbling but a lot of waste. The native of Bondy was quite clumsy in front of the goal. However, he was able to be altruistic several times against his friends on the front of the attack.Icon Sport

PSG-Bruges: the notes of the Parisians!




The fourth day of the Champions League has ended tonight and we already know some participants in the 1/8 final! First, place to the French with Paris-Saint-Germain who, thanks to his success against Bruges, validates his ticket for the next round. Earlier in the evening, Juventus Turin and Bayern Munich have also applied to be present in 2020. Only these three teams have achieved this. For others, it will be necessary to wait one more day!




Evening results
